data.text: @KikJeffrey @MIHouseDems They have a trifecta so there’s no need to punish the governor. The Republicans have the state legislature so they want to punish the Democratic governor. To fix this we could try relieving the Republicans of their 40 year stranglehold on the state legislature.
@MIHouseDems @fradarl29 It is on purpose. To blame Whitmer. Nepotism is first in the MIGQP.
@Stupid_Interweb @MIHouseDems Everyone is ay fault my dude. We all let this happe n
@InStocksWeTrust @MIHouseDems Take that up with the members of Congress instead of the Michigan Democrats
@Stupid_Interweb @MIHouseDems No dude the mass printing of money is causing inflatiom the money should have not been given out it's reckless.
@InStocksWeTrust @MIHouseDems You honestly believe that the federal government is going to refund the money Michigan didn't spend?
@Stupid_Interweb @MIHouseDems So where does the federal money come from? Us...
@MIHouseDems Then elect Dems in Michigan. That’s you simple answer.
@MIHouseDems Deplorable Republicans giving to the rich taking from the poor…

@InStocksWeTrust @MIHouseDems It's money provided by the federal government. Not using it means the money has to come from State taxes instead.

If you're trying to cut your spending and someone offered you $1000 would you turn that money down?
